Acinetobacter can be spread to susceptible persons by person-to-person contact or contact with contaminated surfaces.",CDC,Acinetobacter in Healthcare Settings
How to prevent Acinetobacter in Healthcare Settings ?,"Acinetobacter can live on the skin and may survive in the environment for several days. Careful attention to infection control procedures,
